text: Gerben 'Germ' Hofma (19 April 1925 – 14 October 2018)Ex-international Gerben Hofma overleden was a Dutch football player in the 1940s and 1950s. He most notably played for Heerenveen. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1925 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Dutch footballers Category:Netherlands international footballers Category:SC Heerenveen players Category:Eredivisie players Category:People from Sittard Category:Association football forwards
title: Germ Hofma
